titleStmt.title: Hermetical physick: or, The right way to preserve, and to restore health. By that famous and faithfull chymist, Henry Nollius. Englished by Henry Uaughan, Gent.
titleStmt.author: Nolle, Heinrich, fl. 1612-1619.
Vaughan, Henry, gent,

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his shop, at the Princes Armes in St. Pauls Church-Yard,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
